name: minimal-artistic-portfolio
description: A wordpress theme for artist (painter, sculptor, video-producer, ...) made with SASS, Babel, Gulp and more.
author: Nicolas Lebrun

scripts.export: vite build &&  dir-archiver --src . --dest ../minimal-artistic-portfolio-$npm_package_version.zip --exclude node_modules src .git .vscode .editorconfig .eslintignore .eslintrc.js .gitignore composer.json composer.lock readme.md ruleset.xml package.json phpcs.xml.dist vite.config.js yarn.lock
